metadata.title: CVE-2017-9470 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In ytnef 1.9.2, the MAPIPrint function in lib/ytnef.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted file.

notes.note: leosilva> same as CVE-2017-12142, code is not present in trusty.

criterions.comment: libytnef package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.3-1').
